analysis.description:
Withdrawable.withdrawERC20Token (/unique_chucks/40/0xdf9ecafee99e2954df6258ef85f18cf88462f452.sol#65-73) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(to,token.balanceOf(address(this))) (/unique_chucks/40/0xdf9ecafee99e2954df6258ef85f18cf88462f452.sol#72-73)

Reentrancy in RaindropClient.unofficialApplicationSignUp (/unique_chucks/40/0xdf9ecafee99e2954df6258ef85f18cf88462f452.sol#163-179):
	External calls:
	- hydroBalance = hydro.balanceOf(msg.sender) (/unique_chucks/40/0xdf9ecafee99e2954df6258ef85f18cf88462f452.sol#170-171)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- unofficialApplicationDirectory (/unique_chucks/40/0xdf9ecafee99e2954df6258ef85f18cf88462f452.sol#177-178)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/40/0xdf9ecafee99e2954df6258ef85f18cf88462f452.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.21 (/unique_chucks/40/0xdf9ecafee99e2954df6258ef85f18cf88462f452.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_string' of StringUtils.allLower (/unique_chucks/40/0xdf9ecafee99e2954df6258ef85f18cf88462f452.sol#5) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_hydroTokenAddress' of RaindropClient.setHydroContractAddress (/unique_chucks/40/0xdf9ecafee99e2954df6258ef85f18cf88462f452.sol#206) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_address' of RaindropClient.isSigned (/unique_chucks/40/0xdf9ecafee99e2954df6258ef85f18cf88462f452.sol#244) is not in mixedCase
